Interface IGraph<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Graph

    public interface IGraph<T>
    Graph interface
    Author:
    nicacio, ionesio, roberto

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String BFS(Vertex<T> vertex)
      Breadth-first search
      BFS-Wiki
      java.lang.String DFS(Vertex<T> vertex)
      Depth-First Search
      DFS-Wiki
      int getEdgeNumber() 
      float getMeanEdge() 
      int getVertexNumber() 
      java.lang.String graphRepresentation(RepresentationType rt)
      Graph Representation for:
      Adjacency matrix ("AM") and adjacency list ("AL")
      java.lang.String MST()
      Minimum spanning tree MST-Wiki
      void readGraph(java.lang.String pathFile)
      It reads from a file the edges of a graph
      and automatically creates the vertices based on the edges
      File format:
      <\size value>
      <\source value> <\destination value>
      <...> <...>

      Example:
      2
      1 2
      2 1
      void readWeightedGraph(java.lang.String pathFile)
      It reads from a file the edges of a weighted graph
      and automatically creates the vertices based on the edges
      File format:
      <\size value>
      <\source value> <\destination value> <\weight value>
      <...> <...> <...>
      Example:
      2
      1 2 1.5
      2 1 2.5
      java.lang.Boolean SCC()
      Strongly connected component
      SCC-Wiki
      java.lang.String shortestPath(Vertex<T> v1, Vertex<T> v2)
      Shortest Path Problem using Dijkstra

      • readGraph

        void readGraph(java.lang.String pathFile)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        It reads from a file the edges of a graph
        and automatically creates the vertices based on the edges
        File format:
        <\size value>
        <\source value> <\destination value>
        <...> <...>

        Example:
        2
        1 2
        2 1
        Parameters:
        pathFile -
        Throws:
        FilePathException - or GraphFormatFileException
        java.lang.Exception
